Estimate area function

Estimate area function

estimate_area(B = 5000, seed = 10)

Arguments

B

a non-null positive integer
seed

an integer or NULL

Value

Print a list with the area estimation and its points

Examples

estimate_area(100)
#> $estimated_area
#> [1] 0.63
#>
